segments.text: This kitchen scene feels so heartbreaking in its innocence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is diligently drying dishes, unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflows quietly, like tears spilling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, thinking it's fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool is so unstable; it's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry they'll get hurt, and she'll blame herself later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so expectant, hand raised hopefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a simple moment that could turn tragic so easily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden blooms peacefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, potential sorrow builds with every drop of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes wait, symbols of routine life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang watching this unaware family.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If only she could see what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR
